siteMetadata.name: Anshul Sood
siteMetadata.title: Anshul Sood | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.about:
I'm a Software Engineer with over a year of experience, currently working at Walmart. I love building innovative and impactful products with a primary focus on writing clean, efficient, scalable code. Though primarily interested in Backend development and architecture, I love exploring other fields and have done projects across Full-stack development, Deep Learning and Robotics.
Get in touch at anshulsoodnet@gmail.com if you have an exciting opportunity or want to collaborate on a project.

experience.name: Software Engineer 2, Walmart Global Tech
experience.description:
‣ Building core capabilities to facilitate international trade on the Walmart eCommerce platform.
‣ Have worked in domains like Cataloging, Logistics, Seller Onboarding etc., primarily contributing in backend development.
‣ Tech Stack: Java, Spring Framework, Kafka, Azure, GraphQL

experience.name: Intern, CDAC
experience.description:
‣ Worked on providing Number Plate Recognition as a service.
‣ Built a distributed pipeline for serving Deep Learning models to several video streams in parallel.
‣ Solved the challenges of Object Tracking, Stateful Processing and Distributed Transactions.
‣ Technologies: Kafka, gRPC, Redis, Docker, MySQL

experience.name: Summer Intern, Walmart Global Tech
experience.description:
‣ Created a mechanism to report which Advertising campaigns must be paused or resumed, depending on the item availability in inventory.
‣ Technologies: SpringBoot, Spring JPA, Hibernate, Thymeleaf, MySQL

experience.name: Summer Intern, Maruti Suzuki India Limited
experience.description:
‣ Developed a solution for detecting if a worker is wearing safety gear while working at the workshop, using CCTV cameras.
‣ Used YOLO for object detection and Deep SORT for person tracking.
‣ Technologies: Python, TensorFlow, Tkinter
Code: https://github.com/AnshulSood11/PPE-Detection-YOLO-Deep_SORT

education.name: B.E. Computer Science, Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani
education.description: Activities and Societies: Electronics and Robotics Club, Spree 2018 Organizing Committee

projects.name: MyDreamsTravel
projects.description: A feature-rich travel blogging site built with ReactJS and Django deployed on AWS Beanstalk.

projects.name: Memory Subsystem
projects.description: Implemented a basic memory subsystem in C as a part of Data Storage Technologies course. It consisted of a TLB, 2 level caching and a Main Memory with Paging.

projects.name: Twitter Analytics for Demand Forecasting
projects.description: Tweets are fetched from the Twitter API and their sentiment is analyzed to predict the relative demand for products at a chosen locality. This info can help a retailer stock its inventory accordingly.

projects.name: Engagement Intensity Prediction
projects.description: Performs real-time engagement intensity prediction using gaze and pose estimation. The feed is segmented into 10-second video clips, from which facial features are extracted, and then a neural network determines the level of engagement at the given instant.

projects.name: Position Tracker
projects.description: Developed a localization system for an autonomous developed by the college Robotics Club. It polls data from an Optical Displacement Sensor, Gyroscope, Accelerometer, Magnetometer, and fuses them using Kalman filtering. Used Raspberry Pi as the onboard computer.

skills.name: Languages & Frameworks
skills.description: Java, Spring, Python, Django, JavaScript, React.js, C

skills.name: Other
skills.description: Kafka, gRPC, GraphQL, Docker, Git, Bash, AWS, Microservices, Deep Learning, Data Mining

recognition.name: Project selected for national level INSPIRE Award Exhibition
recognition.info: Department of Science and Technology India, Dec 2011
